pageContext.name: Paw Print Bangles
pageContext.description:
• JEWELRY FOR LOVE: Channel your power with this Alex and Ani Crystal Paw Prints of Love Bangle, a constant reminder that you’ve found unconditional love
  • TIMELESS ACCESSORIES: This beautiful adjustable bangle features a paw print charm with a genuine Austrian crystal heart inside, capturing the preciousness of your four-legged sweetheart
  • SIZING AND CLOSURE: Our innovative, patented, and completely original technology replaces traditional clasps with a sliding mechanism to customize this classic bracelet’s size from 2" to 3.5" wide
  • COMPOSITION: Crafted with love and care in the U.S.A., this effortless accessory is based in a nickel-free brass/copper metal mix for easy care and timeless wear
  • YOUR UNIQUE REMINDER: Feel the love with this Alex and Ani Crystal Paw Prints of Love Expandable Bangle, a reminder of your bond with your furry friend
Material Silver Tone
Color Rafaelian Silver Finish
Brand Alex and Ani
Style Charity By Design Prints of Love
Age Range (Description) Adult

The love we have for our pets is like no other. They’re always there to lift our spirits. Never holding a grudge, they are the first to forgive, the first to forget, and the first to greet us when we come home after a long day. Our pets are a reminder of what unconditional love means. It’s a bond that cannot be broken. Alex and Ani Crystal Paw Prints of Love Bangle expresses the loyal bond between you and your furry best friend. Crafted with love and care, this beautiful bangle features a paw print charm with a genuine Austrian crystal heart inset. Wearing a paw print shows how much you cherish your pet. Our expandable bangle adjusts from 2" to 3.5" in width. Innovative, patented, and completely original technology ensures a customized fit of this elegant bangle bracelet. Made in the U.S.A, this pretty beaded bracelet is nickel-free and has a timeless classic design. We believe that jewelry should be a meaningful representation of who you are, and the characteristics you strive to embody. Choose the Alex and Ani Expandable Bangle as a beautiful gift to yourself- a symbol to wear for love, affection, and loyalty.
